header.title: Join Our Team
header.desc: We're a passionate bunch working from all over the world to build the technologies for AI applications

companyIntro.title: Who We Are
companyIntro.desc: With the vision of bringing the power of AI to every corporation, every organization, and every individual, Zilliz was founded in 2017 by a team of data practitioners committed to building cutting-edge data infrastructure to help enterprises navigate today’s big data challenges.

commentFilip.name: Filip
commentFilip.desc: Your contributions make an impact, not just a cog in the machine. Don't be afraid to ask questions or share your thoughts/concerns.

commentClaire.name: Claire
commentClaire.desc: Function myself as a bridge between our engineering team and the rest of the world by telling the story of our products in a clear, structured, and intriguing manner. Mistakes will be made, but they are worth it as long as lessons are learnt.

commentFrank.name: Frank
commentFrank.desc: ML is becoming more and more ubiquitous, but a lot of infrastructure for ML is still lacking. Zilliz is democratizing vector databases - a major component of ML application development now and in the future.

commentLi.name: Li
commentLi.desc: Barely felt that I was working for myself but someone else in my previous experience. More enjoyed the startup atmosphere in Zilliz where I can work for myself and contribute to something I will be proud of in the future.

commentPatrick.name: Patrick
commentPatrick.desc: Pushing the boundary between known and unknown. Working on interesting problems; learning while having fun!

attribute1.title: Mission driven
attribute1.desc: We're dedicated to serving something beyond ourselves and to bringing the power of AI to the customers.

attribute2.title: Bias for action
attribute2.desc: We trigger action based on thoughtful consideration. We focus on the goals, process and results of our actions.

attribute3.title: Aim for higher
attribute3.desc: High standards are the basis for building trusting relationships. Always execute with excellence.

attribute4.title: Altruism
attribute4.desc: Bring out our best, let go of egos, and work with empathy and trust to achieve great things together.

benefit.title: Our Benefits
benefit.bonus: Regular bonus and equity refresh opportunities​.
benefit.vacation: Paid time off, including vacation, sick leave and global reset/wellbeing days.
benefit.remote: Hybrid work model/Remote work opportunities available.
benefit.notify: *Please note that while our philosophy is the same in every place Zillizers work, benefits may vary by office/country.

job.title: Opening Positions
job.emptyNotice: Unfortunately, no current openings match your search. Please try changing your filters, or check back soon for new openings.
